name: Taxi Simulator Driving Game - Passenger Pick & Drop
summary: Experience the thrill of the urban streets with our immersive taxi simulation game! Take on the role of a taxi driver and navigate through bustling cityscapes, picking up passengers and delivering them to their destinations against the clock. With realistic traffic patterns, challenging weather conditions, and a variety of vehicles to choose from, every ride is a new adventure. Can you become the ultimate master of the taxi world?"
